evidence.text: SLATER KING: That smells nice on you. I like your nails.

SLATER KING: Rich would not like this.
FRIDA: Why?
SLATER KING: Because you're co-dependent and I have abandonment issues.
SLATER KING: This will be fun. Or really fucked up. Or both.
SLATER KING: Let's be in moment. Cuz that's all that matters. No future. No past. Just me and you. Right here. Right now. Hey, I like you.
